item.title: Starting my own blog
item.description: Starting my own blog has been something I really wanted to do. I'll add post related to my different projects but also on Web security. Here are my different motivations : 1. Provide a portfolio of my different projects. 2. Explain some problems I had and provide the solution 3. Talk about some geek stuffs. Let's see :) Hope you'll have fun to read me. Cheers and see you soon.
